ComicInfo.Summary:
Niki's been unmasked. Being captured and chained isn't a problem for the child of the Moth and the Whisper, but now that their face has been seen, nowhere in the city is safe. Unless Niki's parents left them one last surprise... A Young Adult cyberpunk thriller starring a genderqueer super-thief, MOTH & WHISPER is the brainchild of Ted Anderson (My Little Pony, Adventure Time) and Jen Hickman (Jem and the Holograms, The Dead) - a socially significant and engaging story that AfterShock is proud to tell.
